As a new school resolution, you promise that you will stop being so boring and get your cherry pop. However, living in a middle of a conservative town and in the same house with your workaholics $w.father and demure older $w.brother, this goal isn't easy to achieve. Or is it? <center>@@.str;DISCLAIMER@@</center> First of all, this game is mainly being built with <strong>submissive cis-gay male protagonist</strong> in mind and with a slower and more "logical" approach. All the characters in the game are all over 18 years old. The game features taboo subjects such as non-consensual sex, <<if $incest>>incest <</if>>and other adult themes like slurs, substance usage, pornography and gay sex... This is a work of fiction any resemblance to actual persons, living or dead, or actual events is purely coincidental.
